name: Spellwarp
description:
Welcome to Spellwarp! This game was made by a team of 3 in 10 days for Clicker Jam Winter 2023. 

You take the role of a wizard, fleeing through dimensions from a terrible monster, all the while gathering magical power to put a stop to the horrible beast.  Each dimension has different affinities with the elements and different resources available. You won't have time to linger, though, as eventually the monster will appear and you must fight or flee into yet another dimension.

This game is about a 20-30 minute experience, although each playthrough is unique in its own way.

The game was developed by Frank Henry (Programming), Ginghis Ken (Sound), and Annie (Art). Credit goes to the following as well: Nathan Gibson, Christopher Hahn, Darkworld Audio, and Leohpaz for sound effects, and erytau for the font.

Note- there may be some performance issues in the browser, so a Windows executable download is also available.

(A hint if you're having trouble: the Monster has around 10 million attributes with each element, so you may want to take care before rushing into battle ill-prepared.)
